infotexts.entitydescription.nutricard: Slot this into your hematology analyzer to make it print out nutritional information of the patient
infotexts.entitydescription.cleaver: Can be used to chop up the recently deceased. Alternatively, can be used to turn the living into the recently deceased.
infotexts.entitydescription.fryingpan: Can be used to make fried eggs, or to bash skulls in.
infotexts.entitydescription.stove: The home of the frying pan
infotexts.entitydescription.oven: Can be used to heat up many things
infotexts.entitydescription.cuttingboard: Chop up all sorts of food here, or combine ingredients into a completed dish.
infotexts.entitydescription.fridge: Can be used to store perishable food. Or organs.
infotexts.entitydescription.plate: Use these to finish assorted dishes at the cutting board
infotexts.entitydescription.emptypot: Can be filled with water by submerging it
infotexts.entitydescription.pot_tainted: Not safe for consumption. Put on the stove or in the oven to sterilize.
infotexts.entitydescription.pot_water: Safe for consumption. Can be used to make stews or soup.
infotexts.entitydescription.pot_tomatosauce: Safe for consumption. Used for pizza.
infotexts.entitydescription.friedblob: Looks like someone put something in the deep fryer they weren't supposed to...
infotexts.entitydescription.carrot: Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.potato: Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.tomato: Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.lettuce: Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.pickle: Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.onion: It has layers. Can be used as a seedling for planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.livertransplant_food: This liver is dead and can no longer be used as a transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.lungtransplant_food: These lungs are dead and can no longer be used as a transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.hearttransplant_food: This heart is dead and can no longer be used as a transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.kidneytransplant_food: This kidney is dead and can no longer be used as a transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.braintransplant_food: This brain is dead and can no longer be used as a transplant.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_thirst.medium: The patient is expressing severe thirst.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_thirst.high: The patients lips are dry and their fingernails are purple.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_thirst.self.hi: Your lips are dry, your fingernails are purple, you're in great pain and you feel like you could faint any minute.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.low: The patient has a rumbly tummy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.self.lo: You could go for a snack.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.medium: The patient is expressing severe hunger.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.self.me: You feel like you haven't eaten in days.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.high: The patient seems unable to think of anything other than food.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_hunger.self.hi: You feel like you're about to starve. Your stomach has been empty for far too long. Food is all you can think of.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_stuffed: The patients stomach is full. Giving them something to eat now would likely be a regrettable decision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_stuffed.self: Your stomach is full. Eating now would likely be a regrettable decision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_noappetite: The patient is expressing lack of appetite. Doesn't mean you can't force them to eat, at a cost.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sym_noappetite.sel: You really don't feel like eating right now. Eating is slower.
infotexts.jobdescription.chef: Humans are machines, and machines require maintenance. As the chef, your job is maintaining the crew. With tasty little treats.
